name: MnPII
tagline: A bukkit plugin that increases the interest and fun on melons and pumpkins.
body:
# Melon n Pumpkin interest increaser
A simple plugin that plays an effect randomly on break of a melon or pumpkin!

[MnPII.jar](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38204535/Plugins/MnPII.jar)

## Permission nodes
* MnPII.FUN Default: enabled

###Checklist
- [ ] Create more permission nodes
- [ ] Create recipe for exploding pumpkins
- [ ] Clean up Code
- [ ] Create Config with options
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
